content.description: The following is a residual plot for a linear regression of <math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> versus <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: What is indicated by the plot?

choices.label: A linear model is not appropriate.

Variability in <math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is constant for all values <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
At least one point is influential with respect to the regression.
At least one point is an outlier with respect to the regression.

content.answer: A linear model is not appropriate.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
